pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimates Moments for a Truncated Normal Distribution using 'Stan' // Finds the posterior modes for the mean and standard deviation for a truncated normal distribution with one or two known truncation points. The method used extends Bayesian methods for parameter estimation for a singly truncated normal distribution under the Jeffreys prior (see Zhou X, Giacometti R, Fabozzi FJ, Tucker AH (2014). "Bayesian estimation of truncated data with applications to operational risk measurement". doi:10.1080/14697688.2012.752103). This package additionally allows for a doubly truncated normal distribution.
